text: Judith McGrath (21 April 1947 – 21 October 2017) was an Australian actress. She was born in Brisbane, Queensland. She was best known for her television soap roles as Colleen Powell in Prisoner (1979–1984) on Network Ten, Bernice Hudson in A Country Practice on Network Seven between 1992 and 1993 and Von Ryan in the medical drama All Saints (1998–2009) on Network Seven. McGrath died on 21 October 2017 at a hospice in Sydney from lung cancer at the age of 70. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from aortic aneurysm Category:Australian movie actors Category:Australian television actors Category:Australian stage actors Category:Actors from Brisbane
title: Judith McGrath
